Material used.Material Name: Differentiated SH-SY5Y cells overexpressing WT or A53T alpha-synuclein
Material used.Description: Proteomic analysis of SH-SY5Y cells expressing WT or A53T alpha-synuclein.

Readout description.Result Description: 4 mitochondrial proteins showed significant expression changes (p < 0.05) in A53T-expressing cells compared to WT.

Biological replicates.Description: Control cells, WT, and A53T-expressing cells were compared.

Technical replicates.Description: Protein spots were quantified across multiple gels.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cells served as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells served as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and t-tests were used for statistical analysis.

Material used.Material Name: Differentiated SH-SY5Y cells overexpressing WT or A53T alpha-synuclein
Material used.Description: Validation of 4 mitochondrial proteins in WT and A53T-expressing cells.

Readout description.Result Description: Four mitochondrial proteins showed significant expression changes in A53T-expressing cells compared to WT.

Biological replicates.Description: Control cells, WT, and A53T-expressing cells were compared.

Technical replicates.Description: Protein bands were quantified across multiple blots.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cells served as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells served as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and t-tests were used for statistical analysis.
